snippet: The test, developed by Genomic Health, can help distinguish aggressive prostate cancer from less threatening ones, potentially saving many men from unneeded operations.
abstract: Test developed by Genomic Health can help distinguish aggressive prostate cancer from less threatening forms; researchers say test can potentially save many men from unneeded operations for tumors that would never harm them.
lead_paragraph: The test, developed by Genomic Health, can help distinguish aggressive prostate cancer from less threatening ones, potentially saving many men from unneeded operations.

headline.seo: Prostate Cancer Test From Genomic Health Assesses Risks
headline.main: New Test Improves Assessment of Prostate Cancer Risk, Study Says
headline.print_headline: New Test Improves Assessment of Prostate Cancer Risk, Study Says
